name: Wandering Night
description:
●Easy getting in, strategy required hardcore game
●Random maps, unknown challenges, as well as pure Roguelike experience
●Each card is a KEY CARD -- where exist both wisdom and fun
●Which one is your ultimate weapon? — Among the more than three hundred secret Relics.
●Step into the world of alternative fairy tale in the ADVENTURE GROUP with friends;
●The new Arcade mode gives a variety of ways to play, and new rules bring new fun. New fun comes from new rules, select your favorites in Arcade mode;
●Many achievements are waiting for awaits your challenge, so come and control and conquer the deck ultimately!

●Community●
Fan Page: https://www.facebook.com/WNMOBILE/
